item.title: 卢拉为亚马逊地区 COP30 制定的计划有可能成为后勤混乱之虞
item.description: 今年的联合国气候峰会定于 11 月在巴西举行，旨在将世界各国领导人、外交官和大约 5 万名其他与会者带到亚马逊雨林的中心地带，从而创造历史。现在，这场盛会越来越有可能被一场迫在眉睫的后勤灾难所决定。【原文：This year’s United Nations climate summit, scheduled for November in Brazil, has been designed to make history by bringing world leaders, diplomats and some 50,000 other participants into the heart of the Amazon rain forest. Now the event increasingly risks being defined by a looming logistical fiasco.】

item.title: 南非法院暂停批准道达尔能源公司的石油区块
item.description: 南非一家法院推翻了授予道达尔能源 SE 公司在该国西海岸近海石油勘探区块的环境授权的决定。【原文：A South African court overturned a decision granting TotalEnergies SE environmental authorization for an oil exploration block offshore the country’s west coast.】

item.title: 银行业濒危气候联盟在欧洲失势
item.description:
一场始于华尔街的大逃亡正在大西洋两岸蔓延，威胁着世界上最大的银行气候联盟的未来。【原文：

An exodus that started on Wall Street is now spreading across the Atlantic, threatening the future of the world’s largest climate alliance for banks.

】

item.title: 英国风力发电量下滑，酷热天气带来可再生能源风险
item.description: 本周，英国的风力涡轮机几乎停转，因为又一波热浪带来了平静的天气，迫使英国转用天然气发电。【原文：Britain’s wind turbines ground to a near halt this week, as another heat wave brought calm conditions and forced the nation to switch to gas for power generation.】

item.title: 热浪袭来，欧洲终于用上了空调
item.description: 当欧洲汗流浃背地度过又一个气温创历史新高的夏天时，欧洲大陆的大部分地区正在经历一场迅速而又往往紧张的变革。【原文：As Europe sweats through another summer of record-high temperatures, much of the continent is undergoing a rapid and often tense transformation.】

item.title: 大火迫使希腊海滩居民撤离，农作物遭受高温袭击
item.description: 希腊海岸警卫队的船只疏散了游客和当地居民，而在西班牙，一名志愿消防员在当局努力扑灭地中海各地的大火时丧生。【原文：Greek coastguard vessels evacuated tourists and locals, while a volunteer firefighter died in Spain as authorities struggled to quell blazes across the Mediterranean.】

item.title: 台风 "波杜 "袭击台湾南部，带来暴雨
item.description: 台风 "波杜 "在台湾东南沿海登陆，带来暴雨和强风，预计将于周三穿过台湾岛，然后向中国大陆进发。【原文：Typhoon Podul made landfall on Taiwan’s southeastern coast, bringing torrential rains and strong winds, and is forecast to track across the island on Wednesday before heading toward mainland China.】

item.title: MUFG 正在商谈在 4.65 亿美元交易后安排新的债务转换
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is in talks with a number of governments as it seeks to build a pipeline of swaps to help developing nations refinance debt and free up funds for social and infrastructure projects.】

item.title: 基金经理将获得新的风险管理工具：环境、社会和公司治理投资
item.description: 公司不久将被要求在损益账目中反映气候风险，向投资者揭示洪水、风暴和干旱如何影响底线。【原文：Companies will soon be expected to reflect climate risk in their profit and loss accounts, revealing to investors how floods, storms and droughts affect bottom lines.】

item.title: 印度批准在有争议的中国边境附近新建水电项目
item.description: 印度内阁已批准在东北部的阿鲁纳恰尔邦（Arunachal Pradesh）建造一座 700 兆瓦的水力发电站，中国也声称在该地区拥有主权。【原文：India’s cabinet has approved the construction of a 700-megawatt hydropower plant in the northeastern state of Arunachal Pradesh, a region also claimed by China.】

item.title: 灼热热浪引发电网故障，伊拉克陷入一片黑暗
item.description: 周一，伊拉克陷入一片黑暗，因为灼热的高温推高了电力需求，引发输电线路故障，导致全国几乎停电。【原文：Iraq was plunged into darkness on Monday as searing heat pushed up power demand, triggering a failure in transmission lines that led to a near nationwide blackout.】

item.title: 当洛杉矶大火焚烧时，保护住宅免受野火影响的规则却被搁置了
item.description:
加州在2020年通过了一项法律，要求业主创建防微火区。以下是为什么现在才完成本可以拯救洛杉矶房屋的法规。【原文：

California passed a 2020 law requiring property owners to create ember-resistant zones. Here’s why it’s only now finishing regulations that could’ve saved LA homes.

】

item.title: 丹斯克银行削减化石燃料投资风险
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）正在将 1700 多家与化石燃料相关的公司从其投资领域中剔除，理由是这些公司未能为气候变化做好准备。【原文：Danske Bank A/S is removing over 1,700 fossil fuel-related companies from its investment universe, citing their failure to prepare for climate change.】

item.title: 欧洲与大火搏斗，野火使达达尼尔海峡短暂关闭
item.description: 周一傍晚，由于极端炎热和强风助长了整个地中海地区的大火，野火导致达达尼尔海峡短暂关闭，无法通航。【原文：Wildfires briefly shut the Dardanelles Strait to shipping on Monday evening, as extreme heat and strong winds fueled blazes across the Mediterranean.】

item.title: 台风 "波杜 "将在袭击台湾南部前加强
item.description: 随着台风 "波杜 "向台湾南部移动，预计其强度将不断加强，并在周三登陆前带来暴雨和破坏性阵风。【原文：Typhoon Podul is expected to intensify as the system tracks toward southern Taiwan, bringing heavy rain and damaging wind gusts before making landfall on Wednesday.】

item.title: 风电叶片制造商 TPI 复合材料公司在得克萨斯州申请破产
item.description: 风力涡轮机叶片制造商 TPI Composites Inc. 在贷款方橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）的支持下申请破产保护，以重组其债务。【原文：Wind turbine blade manufacturer TPI Composites Inc. has filed for Chapter 11 to restructure its debt with support from lender Oaktree Capital Management.】

item.title: 电厂关闭后电网运营商下令巴尔的摩停电
item.description: 在变电站故障迫使一家大型燃煤发电厂跳闸后，美国最大的电网运营商已下令采取紧急行动，减少巴尔的摩地区的电力使用。【原文：The largest US grid operator has ordered emergency action to curtail power use in the Baltimore area after a substation failure forced a large coal-fired power plant to trip offline.】

item.title: 世界最大的肉类供应商在 COP30 会议上为巴西争取绿色证书
item.description: 世界上最大的肉类供应商希望在今年的 COP30 会议上提高巴西的绿色信誉，提出证据证明巴西的牛对环境并没有那么有害。【原文：The world’s largest meat supplier is aiming to burnish Brazil’s green credentials at this year’s COP30, presenting evidence that the country’s cattle aren’t so harmful to the environment.】

item.title: 热带风暴 "艾琳 "形成，即将成为主要飓风
item.description: 热带风暴艾琳已在非洲附近的佛得角群岛以西形成，有可能在本周晚些时候成为加勒比海的一个主要飓风。【原文：Tropical Storm Erin has formed west of the Cabo Verde Islands near Africa, threatening to become a major hurricane in the Caribbean later this week.】

item.title: Orsted 未能说服投资者它已渡过最糟糕的时期
item.description: Orsted A/S 管理层未能让分析师和投资者相信公司正处于转折点，因为宣布出售股票后，公司损失了近三分之一的价值。【原文：Management of Orsted A/S failed to convince analysts and investors that the company is at a turning point after losing nearly one third of its value from announcing it would sell shares.】

item.title: 创始人手握商业计划书，开始寻找可销售的产品
item.description:
对于雷明顿-霍奇基斯（Remington Hotchkis）来说，想出一个从火灾中拯救家园的点子并不难。而确定一种他可以制造的实际产品则比较困难。【原文：

For Remington Hotchkis, devising an idea for saving homes from fires was the easy part. Identifying an actual product he could make was harder.

】

item.title: 特朗普削减联邦补贴，加州电动汽车补贴陷入僵局
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于下月取消一项重要的电动汽车税收减免政策，据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，加州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）尚未推进其备受推崇的重启加州电动汽车补贴的提议。【原文：With President Donald Trump set to ax a key electric vehicle tax credit next month, California Governor Gavin Newsom has yet to advance his highly touted proposal to restart the state’s own EV subsidies, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 特朗普对华贸易战威胁这些关键绿色技术
item.description:
如果贸易战升级，依赖稀土矿物的电池和产品将面临最大风险。【原文：

Batteries and products that rely on rare earth minerals are among the most at-risk if the trade war escalates.

】

item.title: 得克萨斯州机构警告：有毒页岩钻井废水威胁顶级油田
item.description: 德克萨斯州一个负责监管 1,300 万英亩州属土地的机构警告说，页岩钻探产生的有毒废液有可能污染北美最多产原油盆地的油井。【原文：A Texas agency overseeing 13 million acres of state land is warning that toxic waste fluid from shale drilling threatens to contaminate oil wells in North America’s most prolific crude basin.】

item.title: 热浪来袭，水母导致法国四座核反应堆关闭
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）在其格拉夫林发电厂的过滤桶被成群的水母堵塞后，被迫关闭了四个原子反应堆。【原文：Electricite de France SA was forced to shut four atomic reactors after a swarm of jellyfish clogged up filter drums at its Gravelines power plant.】

item.title: 为抵御严重风暴潮，新斯科舍省投资建设 "生机勃勃的海岸线
item.description:
哈利法克斯和加拿大大西洋沿岸的其他社区正在选择开发盐沼和绿色防波堤，而不是隔墙和岩石屏障，以保护该地区的海岸遗产。【原文：

Halifax and other Atlantic Canada coastal communities are choosing to develop salt marshes and green breakwaters over bulkheads and rock barriers to protect the region’s coastal heritage.

】

item.title: 热浪引发欧洲各地天气和野火警报
item.description: 随着本周热浪席卷欧洲地区，欧洲将面临野火威胁和炙热天气。【原文：Europe is braced for wildfire threats and scorching weather, as a heat wave engulfs the region this week.】

item.title: 贷款人正在审查中国巨型水坝的绿色金融风险
item.description: 据可持续发展惠誉公司称，由于大型水电对环境和社会的潜在影响，中国在西藏修建的 1.2 万亿元人民币（约合 1,670 亿美元）巨型水坝在获得绿色融资时将面临严格审查。【原文：China’s 1.2 trillion yuan ($167 billion) mega-dam in Tibet will face strict scrutiny to access green financing because of the potential environmental and social impacts of large hydropower, according to Sustainable Fitch.】

item.title: 日本熊本因暴雨发布避难令
item.description: 受暴雨影响，日本西南部熊本县当局发布了一系列疏散命令，其中包括台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（TSMC）工厂所在地区。【原文：Authorities in Japan’s southwestern Kumamoto Prefecture have issued a series of evacuation orders due to heavy rain, including an area that houses a factory operated by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: 对冲基金转向绿色能源，开始押注石油
item.description:
投资组合经理一直在扭转过去四年中占主导地位的策略。【原文：

Portfolio managers have been reversing strategies that have dominated over the past four years.

】
